com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport

Class SortInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport.SortInfo

  • public final class SortInfo
extends Object
    Information about how Items are to be processed during a sort operation.
    Since:
    2.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SortInfo(SortBasis sortBasis, SortDirection sortDirection)
      Constructs a new SortInfo, initializing all mandatory fields.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getPropertyTypeId()
      Gets a String containing the identifier of the PropertyType on whose Propertys the Items are to be sorted.
      SortBasis getSortBasis()
      Gets the SortBasis indicating what aspect of Items will be used as the basis for the sort operation.
      SortDirection getSortDirection()
      Gets a SortDirection indicating the order into which the Items are to be sorted.
      void setPropertyTypeId(String propertyTypeId)
      Sets the PropertyType on whose Propertys the Items are to be sorted to the one with the specified identifier.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SortInfo

        public SortInfo(SortBasis sortBasis,
                SortDirection sortDirection)
        Constructs a new SortInfo, initializing all mandatory fields.

        If sortBasis is SortBasis.SCORE, then sortDirection must be SortDirection.DESCENDING.

        Parameters:
        sortBasis - A SortBasis indicating what aspect of Items will be used as the basis for the sort operation.
        sortDirection - A SortDirection indicating the order into which the Items are to be sorted.

    • Method Detail

      • getSortBasis

        public SortBasis getSortBasis()
        Gets the SortBasis indicating what aspect of Items will be used as the basis for the sort operation.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • getPropertyTypeId

        public String getPropertyTypeId()
        Gets a String containing the identifier of the PropertyType on whose Propertys the Items are to be sorted.
        Returns:
        See above, or null if getSortBasis() does not return SortBasis.PROPERTY_TYPE.

      • setPropertyTypeId

        public void setPropertyTypeId(String propertyTypeId)
        Sets the PropertyType on whose Propertys the Items are to be sorted to the one with the specified identifier.
        Parameters:
        propertyTypeId - A String containing the identifier of the PropertyType to set. This method should only be called when getSortBasis() returns SortBasis.PROPERTY_TYPE.

        The specified PropertyType may not have a LogicalType of LogicalType.PICTURE, LogicalType.XML, or LogicalType.DOCUMENT.

      • getSortDirection

        public SortDirection getSortDirection()
        Gets a SortDirection indicating the order into which the Items are to be sorted.
        Returns:
        See above.
